meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jim Devlin Bob Mahoney Jeff Liebowitz Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1305.

td.p: Jim Devlin, a computer programmer from Bakersfield, California
Bob Mahoney, a public affairs officer originally from Melrose, Massachusetts
Jeff Liebowitz, an attorney and writer from Marina del Rey, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $9,801)

tr.td: THE 1940s
(Alex: What a decade!)
HERBS & SPICES
SPORTS
SONG LYRICS
INSECTS
ONOMAPOETIC WORDS

man

JeffJim
')
